title: From batch system toward continuous UV/PS based AOP reactor: The case of Tramadol effluent degradation

The stability of pharmaceutical active ingredients (APIs) and their resistance to conventional treatment methods necessitates the development of degradation methods as point-source treatment before mixing with municipal wastewater. Advanced oxidation...
